display_long_description:
PipePatrol is an innovative exergame designed to blend functional movement exercises with engaging gameplay. Players step into the role of a pipe repair expert, tasked with fixing leaks before the pipes rust and break. By reaching, bending, and turning to repair the system, players practice essential movements that support recovery and improve flexibility, speed, and mobility.

Tailored for rehabilitation centers and physical therapy programs, PipePatrol offers an exciting and interactive way to practice bending and reaching, PipePatrol transforms routine therapy into an enjoyable challenge. Its gamified approach motivates patients to actively participate in their recovery, making it an excellent complement to conventional exercises.

PipePatrol is part of the larger HoloMoves subscription package, offering a range of exergames specifically designed for rehabilitation and physical therapy. Learn more about how PipePatrol can transform therapy at www.holomoves.nl/en.
